articles.title: Google Tops The List Of Data Collectors, Apple Collects The Least: Study - Gizbot
articles.description: Google: Brands like Apple have focused on user privacy whereas brands like Meta have been tangled with data collection and mismanagement. A new report has revealed that Apple collects the least amount of data whereas Google and Twitter top the chart.
articles.content: Data collection over user privacy has been one of the biggest debates in recent times. Brands like Apple have built their product portfolio around user privacy whereas brands like Meta have been tang… [+2522 chars]

articles.title: India Pips China, Becomes 2nd-largest Smartwatch Market Globally For The First Time - News18
articles.description: Indian brands such as Fire-Boltt and Noise took top spots in the global market share, as smartwatch market's shipments grew 13 per cent in the June quarter (Q2) amid macro uncertainties such as inflation and geopolitical conflicts, according to Counterpoint R…
articles.content:
Riding on homegrown brands, India has piped China to become the second largest smartwatch market globally for the first time, growing 347 per cent (year-on-year), a new report claimed.
